--- select_singer_with_limit_and_skiprows.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
LIMIT 100
OFFSET 10

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name: "Singers",
        },
      },
    },
    Limit: &ast.Limit{
      Limit: 26,
      Count: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 32,
        ValueEnd: 35,
        Base: 10,
        Value: "100",
      },
      Offset: &ast.Offset{
        Offset: 36,
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 43,
          ValueEnd: 45,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "10",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers LIMIT 100 OFFSET 10
